author: Bob A
title: Superb little gem in central Paris
text:
I stayed here for an overnight trip to see a concert in Paris.
I selected the hotel based on its location close to Olympia (concert venue), review scores and price.
Before checking in the hotel had sent a pre-arrival welcome email. Never had that before and a great way for them to find out more about my needs. A great little touch.
On arrival I had a wonderful warm welcome. Really made to feel at home. My room was ready on the third floor at the back of the hotel with an internal view.
The room was spacious, modern and well maintained with a great double bed with good quality bedding. Along with a separate sofa bed. Adequate storage too.
Satellite TV, safe and free wifi. Tea and coffee making facility and a mini bar.
Great, if compact bathroom with toiletries and hair dryer. Only quibble was that the shower door leaked water to the floor of the bathroom but a well placed towel solved that.
Breakfast was a buffet with a choice of fruit, cereals, pastries and breads. Plus freshly made coffee or tea and freshly squeezed juice. Yum.
The hotel is superb for central Paris. Really close to the department stores and Opera. Metro stations nearby and within walking distance of the non stop bus to Paris CDG airport.
Would definitely stay here again.
